page.title: 09A day at school, Fraserburgh
page.content: My name is Peter McKenzie, I am 14 and I go Fraserburgh Academy.A typical day begins by me getting washed and dressed and then going downstairs to have my breakfast.I then look out my books and leave for school.I go to registration, then go to my classes. I study{Maths, English, Social Subjects, {Science, Technical and Domestic {Subjects, RE, Art, Music, and PE.}I usually spend break at the school library. At dinner time.I rush home, have my dinner and then take my time going back to school providing I wasn't going to be late.I then work at my lessons through the last two periods of the day till it is time to go home.When I get home I do my homework and watch television. After tea I might go to the{Fencing {Club}of which I am a member.
